author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
It's been a few years since Rust was first brought in to the Linux kernel and the arguments are still going on and recently Greg KH of the kernel discussed why it was a good thing to bring in Rust.

title: Why Are We Still Fighting About Rust In Linux In 2025
